Description: Setup 2-host consumer hardware with networking

Acceptance Criteria: k3s cluster with 2 nodes operational

Acceptance Criteria: All platform services accessible and integrated

Acceptance Criteria: AI Agent responds to family requests in natural language

Description: Deploy family-facing services (media/backup/storage)
Acceptance Criteria: Family members using services daily

Acceptance Criteria: Security hardening complete with monitoring

Acceptance Criteria: Family can self-service basic tasks

Description: Implement ML for anti-pattern detection
Acceptance Criteria: Automatic detection of configuration anti-patterns

Description: Define epics stories tasks and workflow for complete project
Acceptance Criteria: Jira project created with all epics|Workflow defined|Story point scale agreed|Learning labels configured

Description: Select and purchase 2x consumer-grade mini PCs for cluster
Acceptance Criteria: 2x mini PCs purchased (8GB+ RAM 4+ cores)|Network switch/cables acquired|Power management available|Budget <$1000 total

Description: Configure home network with VLANs for cluster
Acceptance Criteria: VLAN for cluster traffic created|Static IPs assigned (192.168.100.10-11)|DNS forwarding configured|Internet connectivity verified

Description: Install CentOS Stream 9 on both hosts with cloud-init
Acceptance Criteria: CentOS Stream 9 installed on both hosts|Cloud-init configured|SSH access working|Hosts accessible at 192.168.100.10 and .11

Description: Setup local storage and prepare for distributed storage
Acceptance Criteria: LVM configured for flexibility|Partitions for OS boot and data created|Storage ready for k3s PVs|Backup strategy documented

Description: Install k3s on both hosts in HA configuration
Acceptance Criteria: k3s installed on both nodes|HA with embedded etcd|kubectl access working|Nodes show Ready status

Description: Setup cluster networking with MetalLB for LoadBalancer
Acceptance Criteria: MetalLB deployed|IP pool configured (192.168.100.50-60)|LoadBalancer services get IPs|External access working

Description: Setup local-path-provisioner for persistent volumes
Acceptance Criteria: local-path-provisioner deployed|StorageClass created and set as default|Test PVC provisions successfully|PVs created on both nodes

Description: Deploy Traefik ingress controller with TLS
Acceptance Criteria: Traefik deployed as ingress controller|TLS certificate management configured|Test ingress route accessible|*.homelab.local domain working

Description: Deploy Argo CD for GitOps workflow
Acceptance Criteria: Argo CD deployed|App-of-apps pattern configured|Git repo connected|Auto-sync working for test app

Description: Setup Pi-hole or CoreDNS for internal DNS
Acceptance Criteria: DNS server deployed|homelab.local domain resolving|Ad-blocking active (bonus)|Family devices using DNS

Description: Setup FreeIPA for authentication and authorization
Acceptance Criteria: FreeIPA installed and initialized|Users created for family members|SSO working for test service|CA certificates distributed

Description: Setup HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
Acceptance Criteria: Vault deployed in HA mode|Unsealed and accessible|Secrets engine configured|Integration with k8s working

Description: Deploy cert-manager integrated with FreeIPA CA
Acceptance Criteria: cert-manager deployed|ClusterIssuer for FreeIPA CA created|Auto certificate issuance working|TLS for all services

Description: Design natural language interface for family
Acceptance Criteria: Architecture diagram created|Intent recognition design complete|Permission model defined|API endpoints specified

Acceptance Criteria: Ollama deployed to k3s|Llama 3.1 8B model downloaded|API accessible|Test inference successful (<2s response)

Description: Code intent recognition engine with 10+ intents
Acceptance Criteria: NLInterfaceEngine class implemented|10+ intents recognized|Confidence scoring working|Parameter extraction functional

Description: Connect AI agent to FreeIPA for permissions
Acceptance Criteria: LDAP integration working|Group-based permissions enforced|User context passed correctly|Permission denied messages friendly

Description: Create simple web chat interface for AI Agent
Acceptance Criteria: FastAPI backend deployed|React frontend working|WebSocket for real-time chat|Mobile-responsive design

Description: Add safety checks and approval workflows
Acceptance Criteria: Quota enforcement working|Cost estimation implemented|Approval workflow for sensitive ops|Rollback capability added

Description: Setup Plex for family media streaming
Acceptance Criteria: Plex deployed with persistent storage|Media library accessible|Family accounts created|Mobile apps working

Description: Deploy Nextcloud for family file storage/sharing
Acceptance Criteria: Nextcloud deployed|WebDAV working|10GB+ storage per family member|Desktop/mobile sync working

Description: Setup automatic phone photo backup to cluster
Acceptance Criteria: Photo backup jobs configured|Automatic upload from phones|Organized by date/person|Accessible via web interface

Description: Setup Home Assistant for smart home integration
Acceptance Criteria: Home Assistant deployed|Smart devices discovered|Automations working|Voice assistant integration (bonus)

Description: Implement automated backup with Velero or Restic
Acceptance Criteria: Backup solution deployed|Daily automated backups|Offsite backup to cloud (encrypted)|Restore tested successfully

Description: Setup zero-trust with network policies
Acceptance Criteria: Network policies deny all by default|Explicit allow rules for services|Pod-to-pod traffic restricted|External traffic controlled

Acceptance Criteria: Prometheus scraping all targets|Grafana dashboards created|Alerts configured|Family dashboard available

Acceptance Criteria: Falco deployed|Custom rules for homelab|Alerts to admin|Dashboard showing events

Acceptance Criteria: Audit logs centralized|User actions logged|90-day retention|Search interface available

Acceptance Criteria: CIS benchmark scan passed|Security contexts on all pods|Secrets encrypted at rest|Regular vulnerability scans automated

Acceptance Criteria: Runbook created with all procedures|Troubleshooting guide included|Disaster recovery documented|Update procedures written

Acceptance Criteria: 5+ videos created (<5 min each)|How to ask AI agent|How to access services|How to upload photos

Description: Train family members on using services
Acceptance Criteria: All family members trained|Can access services independently|Can ask AI agent questions|Feedback collected

Description: Use ML to detect unusual patterns in usage
Acceptance Criteria: Anomaly detection model trained|Baseline usage patterns learned|Alerts on anomalies|False positive rate <10%

Description: Detect infrastructure configuration anti-patterns
Acceptance Criteria: Anti-pattern detection model created|10+ anti-patterns detected|Suggestions for fixes|Integration with AI Agent

Acceptance Criteria: Auto-remediation engine working|Safe-mode for approval required|Rollback on failure|Remediation logs available
